item.title: Minimum-Wage Workers in These 19 States Just Got a Raise
item.description: The federal minimum wage of $7.25 per hour has not budged since 2009, essentially leaving it to states to set meaningful minimum wage increases.

item.title: Many Retirees Are Making This $1.7 Billion Mistake With Their IRAs
item.description: Millions of retirees forget mandatory withdrawals, risking hefty IRS penalties on their retirement accounts.
